title: MSC - number of ships 2020
summary: This is a bar chart representing Ship Type in the x axis and Number of ships in the y axis.
The maximum Number of ships 397.0 is found at Ship Type Chartered and the minimum is found at Orderbook where Ship Type is 13.0.
The highest Ship Type Chartered has 384.0 more Number of ships than the lowest Ship Type Orderbook.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Ship Type in the x axis and Number of ships in the y axis.
The maximum Number of ships 397.0 is found at Ship Type Chartered and the minimum is found at Orderbook where Ship Type is 13.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Ship Type in the x axis and Number of ships in the y axis.
The maximum Number of ships 397.0 is found at Ship Type Chartered and the minimum is found at Orderbook where Ship Type is 13.0.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Ship Type in the x axis and Number of ships in the y axis.
The maximum Number of ships 397.0 is found at Ship Type Chartered and the minimum is found at Orderbook where Ship Type is 13.0.
Ship Type Owned has the second highest value for Number of ships.
The Number of ships of Ship Type Orderbook is 30.54% smaller than the maximum value at Chartered.
Considered together, the average Number of ships in all 3 Ship Types is roughly 195.67.
The Number of ships is 587.0 if we add up values of all Ship Types.
